rev.comment: /* The Position of Turkish authorities */ correct link
/* World War I */ background --> main article ({{background}} deleted in TfD)
/* Before the war */ non-templated version of details (for multiple topics) and del separate details for Hamidian massacres, as otherwise it is redundant... should be cleaned-up/expanded
/* See also */ Intorducing two navigation templates, one for armenia and one for turkey
/* Support */ The word "counted" suggests research. Besides, him and his statement are discussed immediately below.
/* Official Recognition */ removed states not on ANI list (see discussion), removed map until new map drawn.
rv; text doesn't say his view was as a result of hard research
/* Support */ removed Pamuk estimate, his was a general statement, not the result of a historical study.
/* Opposition */ moved Halacoglu to Turkish academics
/* Official Recognition */ removed double metion of PKE, added so-called to its parliament in exile status.
